1 Prerequisites

To run these tests, you need the following:
* Eclipse 3.1
* JRE 1.5.0_02
* Compiler compliance level: 5.0

Previously aspect-1.2 was required; this has now been removed.

1 Running the tests
* open up Eclipse:/de.berlios.rcpviewer.tests/src/de/berlios/rcpviewer/tests/AllRcpViewerTests.java
* Run > Run As > JUnit Test
* Run > Run As > JUnit Plugin Test
